<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update organization types by query"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/types/query/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Batch-updates organization types that match the supplied filter criteria. Use this when you need to apply the same change (such as renaming or scope adjustments) across multiple types.

**Workflow Example**
1. Build a filter set that targets the types you want to update.
2. Provide the Update payload and call [PUT /api/v1.0/organizations/types/query/update](/docs/api/organizations/update-organization-types-by-query).

**Minimal Required Fields**: Update payload; Filters recommended to scope the update set.

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for batch-updating organization types by query.","properties":{"Update":{"type":"object","description":"Represents a type/category for organizations (event venues).","properties":{"OrganizationTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the organization type."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the organization type was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the organization type was last modified."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the organization type has been soft-deleted."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the site this organization type belongs to. Null for global types."},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["Global","Site"],"description":"Scope of the organization type - Global or Site-specific."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the organization type."}},"title":"OrganizationType"},"Filters":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Filter condition for search/list operations. Based on C# `DataFilter` from `Spark.Shared.Models.DataFramework`. Supports both simple filters and nested filter groups.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"Field name or facet to filter on (e.g., 'Status', 'LocationId', 'CreatedDate')"},"Ids":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Array of UUIDs to filter by (for ID-based facets)"},"Values":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Array of string values to filter by"},"Op":{"allOf":[{"type":"string","description":"Filter operations for DataFilter queries.
